comments:
I am trying to run a build and when it gets to the part where I am running the generator against the agent, I get a ton of errors with the following flavour. Note that Simon is able to reproduce this in his workspace.

     [exec] Generating metadata for /home/dj/equinox.p2.build/agent/eclipse
     [exec] java.io.IOException: unable to open output stream for canonical: org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.motif.aix.ppc/eclipse/plugin/1.0.100.v20071112
     [exec]     at org.eclipse.equinox.p2.metadata.generator.Generator.publishArtifact(Generator.java:533)
     [exec]     at org.eclipse.equinox.p2.metadata.generator.Generator.generateBundleIUs(Generator.java:156)
     [exec]     at org.eclipse.equinox.p2.metadata.generator.Generator.generate(Generator.java:125)
     [exec]     at org.eclipse.equinox.internal.p2.metadata.generator.EclipseGeneratorApplication.run(EclipseGeneratorApplication.java:271)
     [exec]     at org.eclipse.equinox.internal.p2.metadata.generator.EclipseGeneratorApplication.start(EclipseGeneratorApplication.java:282)
     [exec]     at org.eclipse.equinox.internal.app.EclipseAppHandle.run(EclipseAppHandle.java:193)
     [exec]     at org.eclipse.core.runtime.internal.adaptor.EclipseAppLauncher.runApplication(EclipseAppLauncher.java:106)
     [exec]     at org.eclipse.core.runtime.internal.adaptor.EclipseAppLauncher.start(EclipseAppLauncher.java:76)
     [exec]     at org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.run(EclipseStarter.java:362)
     [exec]     at org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.run(EclipseStarter.java:175)
     [exec]     at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
     [exec]     at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39)
     [exec]     at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)
     [exec]     at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:585)
     [exec]     at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.invokeFramework(Main.java:516)
     [exec]     at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:456)
     [exec]     at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:1194)
     [exec]     at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:1170)

I've checked in what I think is the right fix. SimpleArtifactRepository's getOutputStream wasn't updated to reflect the removal of the ArtifactRequest in its signature.
Stefan could you take a quick look.
